title: Can lasthit okay, but still end up with only ~150 CS at 30 minutes as mid-laner.
body:
I can usually get between 60-80 CS by 10 minutes as a mid-laner.  My lasthitting is not that good, but okay.  

The problem arises around mid-game when I notice that the ADC starts coming mid and takes a lot of it.  

It's not just that, but at my ELO, people LOVE to fight and skirmishes are happening all the time, which quite frankly isn't my style.  I like to play passive and just farm up and get a couple kills here and there, but I generally don't like blood baths.  The reason this affects me is I often feel obligated to take part in the skirmishes, because if I don't then I'll get flamed for "noob mid didn't help", which is a plausible complaint.  

Taking wraiths/wolves isn't reliable because someone else most of the time starts taking them.  I can't go bot because ADC still wants bot farm in addition to mid-lane farm and I can't go top because the top-laner is usually there.  

As a result, I can't help only ending up with like 150 CS at 30 minutes, with all the fighting and lack of available farm.  

Is there anything I can do to better my CS with these conditions?
